alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 11:56PM EST until January 12 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive runoff continues. * WHERE...A portion of piedmont North Carolina, including the following county, Cabarrus. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 PM EST, the stream gauge on the Rocky River above Irish Buffalo Creek was at 15.8 feet and falling. Minor flooding is ongoing along the Rocky River in the advisory area. The river levels will continue to drop through daybreak Thursday as flood waters drain downstream. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
